body: for HPD complaints, the agency's unique complaint# is not included. This is different from the Unique Key field, but it can be and is designed to be used by citizens to check the status of their complaints on HPD's website. Is it possible to add a field containing each agency's unique identifier for their complaints?

body: This dataset has gotten too large to be useful. 2010-present is far too many complaints for someone to need to download it all at once. Are there plans to begin a new one? Previous years are one year to a doc. this would help.

children.body: I also vote that the file be broken down on a time-period basis.  Perhaps, a monthly snapshot so when big events like Sandy hits and there are 10,000 311 calls per hour, the size of the resulting file is still reasonable.

body: Will this data be updated with the result of the complaints? or will that be a different file?

children.body: We do update records to reflect when they have been resolved. The 'Closed Date' field will be populated and the 'Status' field will show 'Closed'.
